headline: XA Investments Interval Fund (OCTIX) Now Available for Purchase on Charles Schwab
summary: CHICAGO, Jan. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- XA Investments LLC (“XAI”), a leader in closed-end interval and tender offer fund research, is now offering the Octagon XAI CLO Income Fund (“OCTIX” or the “Fund”) for purchase by advisers who clear or custody through the Charles Schwab platform (“Schwab”), expanding access of XAI’s registered offerings for financial advisors and their clients. “The addition of OCTIX to the Charles Schwab platform marks a major milestone for the fund. headline: Schwab's Sonders Sees a Non-Linear Broadening Out of Markets in 2026
summary: Liz Ann Sonders, chief investment strategist at Charles Schwab, says "opportunities are fairly ripe" beyond the "magnificent seven" stocks this year and explains the current benefits of international diversification in a portfolio.

raw.headline: Schwab's Sonders Sees a Non-Linear Broadening Out of Markets in 2026
raw.summary: Liz Ann Sonders, chief investment strategist at Charles Schwab, says "opportunities are fairly ripe" beyond the "magnificent seven" stocks this year and explains the current benefits of international diversification in a portfolio.

headline: Will Softer STAX Readings and Net Selling Shift Charles Schwab's (SCHW) Retail Sentiment Narrative?
summary: In December, Charles Schwab reported that its Schwab Trading Activity Index™ (STAX) slipped to 48.48 from 48.75 in November, reflecting a slight cooling in retail trading and the first month in three that Schwab clients were net sellers, largely tied to year-end portfolio repositioning across major sectors. This shift in client behavior offers a real-time window into how individual investors adjusted risk and sector exposure at year-end, which can be an important barometer for broader retail...

headline: 1 Volatile Stock on Our Watchlist and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Market swings can be tough to stomach, and volatile stocks often experience exaggerated moves in both directions. While many thrive during risk-on environments, many also struggle to maintain investor confidence when the ride gets bumpy.

raw.headline: 1 Volatile Stock on Our Watchlist and 2 Facing Challenges
raw.summary: Market swings can be tough to stomach, and volatile stocks often experience exaggerated moves in both directions. While many thrive during risk-on environments, many also struggle to maintain investor confidence when the ride gets bumpy.
